verses.verse: When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had spoken <S%G2036><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> words, he went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> with his disciples <S%G3101><s%> over <S%G4008><s%> the brook <S%G5493><s%> Cedron, <S%G2748><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> was a garden, <S%G2779><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> he entered, <S%G1525><s%> and his disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

And Judas <S%G2455><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him, knew <S%G1492><s%> the place: <S%G5117><s%> for Jesus <S%G2424><s%> often <S%G4178><s%> resorted <S%G4863><s%> thither <S%G1563><s%> with his disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

Judas <S%G2455><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> having received <S%G2983><s%> a band <S%G4686><s%> of men and officers <S%G5257><s%> from the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> thither <S%G1563><s%> with lanterns <S%G5322><s%> and torches <S%G2985><s%> and weapons. <S%G3696><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things that should come <S%G2064><s%> on him, went <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Whom <S%G5101><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> you?

They answered <S%G611><s%> him, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth. <S%G3478><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, I am <S%G1510><s%> he. And Judas <S%G2455><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him, stood <S%G2476><s%> with them.

As soon then <S%G3767><s%> as he had said <S%G2036><s%> to them, I am <S%G1510><s%> he, they went <S%G565><s%> backward, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3694><s%> and fell <S%G4098><s%> to the ground. <S%G5476><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> he them again, <S%G3825><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> you? And they said, <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth. <S%G3478><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> I have told <S%G2036><s%> you that I am <S%G1510><s%> he: if <S%G1487><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> you seek <S%G2212><s%> me, let <S%G863><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> their way:

That the saying <S%G3056><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spoke, <S%G2036><s%> Of them which <S%G3739><s%> you gave <S%G1325><s%> me have I lost <S%G622><s%> none. <S%G3762><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a sword <S%G3162><s%> drew <S%G1670><s%> it, and smote <S%G3817><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest's <S%G749><s%> servant, <S%G1401><s%> and cut <S%G609><s%> off <S%G609><s%> his right <S%G1188><s%> ear. <S%G5621><s%> The servant's <S%G1401><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was Malchus. <S%G3124><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Put <S%G906><s%> up your sword <S%G3162><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sheath: <S%G2336><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> my Father <S%G3962><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> me, shall I not drink <S%G4095><s%> it?
Then <S%G3767><s%> the band <S%G4686><s%> and the captain <S%G5506><s%> and officers <S%G5257><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> took <S%G4815><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and bound <S%G1210><s%> him,

And led <S%G520><s%> him away <S%G520><s%> to Annas <S%G452><s%> first; <S%G4412><s%> for he was father <S%G3995><s%> in law <S%G3995><s%> to Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> that same <S%G1565><s%> year. <S%G1763><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> was he, which <S%G3588><s%> gave <S%G4823><s%> counsel <S%G4823><s%> to the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> that it was expedient <S%G4851><s%> that one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%> should die <S%G622><s%> for the people. <S%G2992><s%>

And Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and so did another <S%G243><s%> disciple: <S%G3101><s%> that disciple <S%G3101><s%> was known <S%G1110><s%> to the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> and went <S%G4897><s%> in with Jesus <S%G2424><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the palace <S%G833><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest. <S%G749><s%>

But Peter <S%G4074><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> without. <S%G1854><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out that other <S%G243><s%> disciple, <S%G3101><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was known <S%G1110><s%> to the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> and spoke <S%G2036><s%> to her that kept <S%G2377><s%> the door, <S%G2377><s%> and brought <S%G1521><s%> in Peter. <S%G4074><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the damsel <S%G3814><s%> that kept <S%G2377><s%> the door <S%G2377><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Are <S%G1488><s%> not you also <S%G2532><s%> one of this <S%G5127><s%> man's <S%G444><s%> disciples? <S%G3101><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not.

And the servants <S%G1401><s%> and officers <S%G5257><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> there, who had made <S%G4160><s%> a fire of coals; <S%G439><s%> for it was cold: <S%G5592><s%> and they warmed <S%G2328><s%> themselves: and Peter <S%G4074><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> with them, and warmed <S%G2328><s%> himself.
The high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and of his doctrine. <S%G1322><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, I spoke <S%G2980><s%> openly <S%G3954><s%> to the world; <S%G2889><s%> I ever <S%G3842><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> in the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> and in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> resort; <S%G4905><s%> and in secret <S%G2927><s%> have I said <S%G2980><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

Why <S%G5101><s%> ask <S%G1905><s%> you me? ask <S%G1905><s%> them which heard <S%G191><s%> me, what <S%G5101><s%> I have said <S%G2980><s%> to them: behold, <S%G2396><s%> they know <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> I said. <S%G2036><s%>

And when he had thus <S%G5023><s%> spoken, <S%G2036><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the officers <S%G5257><s%> which stood <S%G3936><s%> by struck <S%G1325><s%> <S%G4475><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> with the palm <S%G4475><s%> of his hand, saying, <S%G2036><s%> Answer <S%G611><s%> you the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> so? <S%G3779><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, If <S%G1487><s%> I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> evil, <S%G2560><s%> bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of the evil: <S%G2556><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> well, <S%G2573><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> smite <S%G1194><s%> you me?
Now <S%G3767><s%> Annas <S%G452><s%> had sent <S%G649><s%> him bound <S%G1210><s%> to Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest. <S%G749><s%>

And Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> and warmed <S%G2328><s%> himself. They said <S%G2036><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to him, Are <S%G1488><s%> not you also <S%G2532><s%> one of his disciples? <S%G3101><s%> He denied <S%G720><s%> it, and said, <S%G2036><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not.

One <S%G1520><s%> of the servants <S%G1401><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> his kinsman <S%G4773><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> ear <S%G5621><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> cut <S%G609><s%> off, <S%G609><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Did not I see <S%G1492><s%> you in the garden <S%G2779><s%> with him?
Peter <S%G4074><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> again: <S%G3825><s%> and immediately <S%G2112><s%> the cock <S%G220><s%> crew. <S%G5455><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> led <S%G71><s%> they Jesus <S%G2424><s%> from Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> to the hall <S%G4232><s%> of judgment: <S%G4232><s%> and it was early; <S%G4405><s%> and they themselves <S%G846><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> not into <S%G1519><s%> the judgment <S%G4232><s%> hall, <S%G4232><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they should be defiled; <S%G3392><s%> but that they might eat <S%G5315><s%> the passover. <S%G3957><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out to them, and said, <S%G2036><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> accusation <S%G2724><s%> bring <S%G5342><s%> you against <S%G2596><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man? <S%G444><s%>
They answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, If <S%G1487><s%> he were not a malefactor, <S%G2555><s%> we would not have delivered <S%G3860><s%> him up to you.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> to them, Take <S%G2983><s%> you him, and judge <S%G2919><s%> him according <S%G2596><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%> The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, It is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> for us to put <S%G615><s%> any <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> to death: <S%G615><s%>

That the saying <S%G3056><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spoke, <S%G2036><s%> signifying <S%G4591><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> he should <S%G3195><s%> die. <S%G599><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the judgment <S%G4232><s%> hall <S%G4232><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> and called <S%G5455><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Are <S%G1488><s%> you the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews? <S%G2453><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, Say <S%G3004><s%> you this <S%G5124><s%> thing of yourself, <S%G1438><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> did others <S%G243><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> it you of me?

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> Am <S%G1510><s%> I a Jew? <S%G2453><s%> Your <S%G4674><s%> own nation <S%G1484><s%> and the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> have delivered <S%G3860><s%> you to me: what <S%G5101><s%> have you done? <S%G4160><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> My kingdom <S%G932><s%> is not of this <S%G5127><s%> world: <S%G2889><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> my kingdom <S%G932><s%> were of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> then would my servants <S%G5257><s%> fight, <S%G75><s%> that I should not be delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the Jews: <S%G2453><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> is my kingdom <S%G932><s%> not from hence. <S%G1782><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Are <S%G1488><s%> you a king <S%G935><s%> then? <S%G3766><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> You say <S%G3004><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%> a king. <S%G935><s%> To this <S%G5124><s%> end was I born, <S%G1080><s%> and for this <S%G5124><s%> cause came <S%G2064><s%> I into <S%G1519><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> that I should bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> to the truth. <S%G225><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> one that is of the truth <S%G225><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> my voice. <S%G5456><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, What <S%G5101><s%> is truth? <S%G225><s%> And when he had said <S%G2036><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> out again <S%G3825><s%> to the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, I find <S%G2147><s%> in him no <S%G3762><s%> fault <S%G156><s%> at all.

But you have <S%G2076><s%> a custom, <S%G4914><s%> that I should release <S%G630><s%> to you one <S%G1520><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the passover: <S%G3957><s%> will <S%G1014><s%> you therefore <S%G3767><s%> that I release <S%G630><s%> to you the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews? <S%G2453><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> cried <S%G2905><s%> they all <S%G3956><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Not this <S%G5126><s%> man, but Barabbas. <S%G912><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> Barabbas <S%G912><s%> was a robber. <S%G3027><s%>
